instruction: <Architect> Start by placing one purple gasket on rows 1 through 6 all in the first column.
<Architect> In the first row, starting from the second column, place a horizontal row of four yellow washers. All on the same row.
<Architect> In the sixth row, starting from the second column, place a horizontal row of four purple gaskets. All on the same row.
<Architect> Above the last washer of the row you just built, put a yellow screw.
<Architect> Finally, put a green washer on either sides of the screw you just placed.
